item.title: Protestant Nonconformity in Kegworth
item.description: Kegworth is a large industrial village and parish in north Leicestershire. It is about 6 miles north-north-west of Loughborough and 13 miles south-east of Derby. It stands on the A6 former coaching road from London to the north-west, and today has good connections with much of the country via junction 24 ofÂ the M1 motorway.
item.dc:creator: PamF
